Dialogue: Goddammit.

Dialogue: Shelby?

Dialogue: Praise Jesus.

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: What the hell were those things?! You ever seen anything like that? You ever heard of anything like that?

Dialogue: Me neither. And I watch 'Animal Planet' all the fuckin' time!

Dialogue: No reception out here.

Dialogue: Bill, I'll run out to your car, call for paramedics from there.

Dialogue: That's a long ways. Them worms are out there.

Dialogue: I'll keep my mouth covered.

Dialogue: No. I'll go. The three of you, you wait here. Get these folks, out of the barn. The stench and rot can't be any good for 'em.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Be careful, Bill.

Dialogue: It's got to be some Goddamn biological weapons. Government's testin' 'em out on us! 'Cause who gives a shit if Wheelsy disappears, right?!

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: I hope it ain't contagious. I'll be pissed as hell I turn into a big mollusk. I'll fuckin' sue, I swear to God.

Speaker: wally
Dialogue: Hey, sugarplum.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: wally
Dialogue: Marriage. It's a sacred bond. Just like you said.

Speaker: wally
Dialogue: I'm sorry 'bout trying to strangle you and all. I lost -- Lost my head. I didn't want to do none of the things I done. Not kill them pets. Not make Brenda a womb. But it's my nature, ain't it? How can you blame a one for actin' according to his nature?

Speaker: wally
Dialogue: I wanted to tell you what was going on. But I didn't - didn't think you'd love me no more. I never knew... love, Starla, I --

Speaker: margaret
Dialogue: Wally?

Speaker: margaret
Dialogue: You all right?

Speaker: margaret
Dialogue: Maybe you better sit back down. You don't look so good.

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: Margaret.

Dialogue: Kylie, honey, you okay? Come on out.

Dialogue: Open the door, sweetie. I know we don't look so good, but your mommy and daddy love you.

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: Get away!!

Speaker: kylie's mom
Dialogue: Now, Kylie, there's no excuse why not to be with your family. This is family fun day, isn't it?

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Hey!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: What's -- ?

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: What's going on here?

Speaker: kylie's dad
Dialogue: Well, hello there, Pardy.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: What happened to you, Dwight?

Speaker: kylie's dad
Dialogue: Poison ivy out back, maybe?

Speaker: kylie's sisters
Dialogue: We're itchy!

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: They're not my... They killed...

Dialogue: Okay. Y'all just wait in this spot. I'm gonna call the paramedics for you. Kylie can come with --

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Come on.

Dialogue: Now, what'd I say?! Y'all just sit down! You need to get some Goddamn rest! You're sick!

Dialogue: Trevor, come on.

Dialogue: What'd you do to her?!

Dialogue: Why are you talking like Grant?!

Dialogue: You swore to honor and obey --

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Don't come any closer.    I'll... shoot.

Dialogue: Oh shit oh shit oh shit oh shit!

Dialogue: Shit.   Ammo's in the trunk.

Dialogue: Trevor!   Margaret!

Dialogue: Go!   Go!   Please!

Dialogue: Dumbshits.

Dialogue: Come on!

Dialogue: Shelby?

Dialogue: Shelby, you there?

Dialogue: You dig that rat out of the hole?

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Listen, you got any reports of... I don't know what you call 'em. They look like big slugs, only fast.

Dialogue: Slugs? No. 'Less you talkin' about that new waitress down at Sloan's! Ha ha!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shelby --

Speaker: shelby
Dialogue: Oh, shit! I hope she ain't a police radio aficionado. If so, I apolog -

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shelby, shut up. Keep an eye out for these things. If you see 'em, keep your mouth covered. Otherwise they'll go straight down it. All right?

Dialogue: Are you nodding?

Speaker: shelby
Dialogue: Yeah.

Dialogue: I can't hear when you're nodding.

Speaker: shelby
Dialogue: Sorry.

Dialogue: We'll be there in ten minutes.

Dialogue: The worms are in their brains.

Dialogue: She's right. We saw one -- one came out of Wally's head.

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: Yeah. Sort of his eye, it came out there --

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Kylie, how do you --

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Kylie, how do you know that?

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Kylie, honey.    Please.

Dialogue: I was in the bath. It tried to go inside me and I -- for a minute I became it.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: The worm?

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: I got it out.

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: What are they?

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: Part of him.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Who?  Who?

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: Mrs. Grant's husband.

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: But not always. I was -- He was... other stuff too.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: What other stuff?

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: He's a fucking Martian?!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: A Martian is from Mars, Trevor.

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: For real it looks like a needle. Its real face. But it always gots another.

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: Now he's here.     He went in Mr. Grant.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Through a wound on his stomach?

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: He took him over. His body. His -- his brain, everything what he knew. He's only been dumb stuff before - amoeba-things, and rhino-things. He liked being human. Didn't want to change.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: And you said the worms are part of him. They're all linked, like one creature?

Speaker: kylie
Dialogue: When one sees you they all see you.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: An animal that doesn't procreate. It spreads, grows. A living disease.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: So the way to stop this thing is to stop Grant?

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shit.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shelby, we broke down on 22, a mile outside town. Come pick us up.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Do it.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Hey, Starla.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Was always curious why you... married Grant in the first place... Just never seemed outta love.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: I know what people say, Bill. I... Remember, back in high school I worked at my father's gas station?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant used to get filled up every day. I knew it was just to see me. He was too old -- But he was handsome. And he had that big ol' Lincoln then. I flirted with him.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Well, big ol' Lincoln, sure. Guess I would have flirted with him too.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: My father, he was -- he was real close to evil. People didn't know. Still don't. From the time I was a toddler he'd beat the hell out of me. I don't mean just like a smack for smart-mouthing... he took a real enjoyment in it. And when I turned eleven or twelve, things... well, they got worse.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: When you wanted to run away, I called your dad.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: That wasn't a good night, no.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: I'm sorry.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Anyway, Grant rolls in one day. I fill his tank with like an eighth- a-gallon as usual. And he notices my lip's all swollen up, and starts asking me how it happened. I don't know why I chose then, why Grant -- I guess I saw an opportunity. And I told him everything, first time I told anyone. Grant was furious. He picked up a tire iron, walked straightaway into the garage, and beat my father half to death. You say it's not about love, Bill. But that was the closest thing to it I ever knew.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant asked me to marry him a few weeks later. I felt... safe with him.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: After all this shit tonight, I know for sure now you regret not running off with me to Hollywood!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Hell, Starla.    I always regretted that.

Dialogue: Don't worry, kid. Pretty soon, we'll be in town, everything'll be fine.

Dialogue: What's that?

Dialogue: They musta hit a deer. Probably got out to see if it's okay.

Dialogue: Fuck me.

Dialogue: Bambi-rats!

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Get in!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shelby!

Speaker: trevor
Dialogue: When I buy my zoo, I'm leaving them things the hell out!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Shelby!

Dialogue: Shelby! We need people out here at Cosgrove and McCammon right away!

Speaker: shelby
Dialogue: Already on our way.

Dialogue: Come on.

Dialogue: What the hell are we going to do?!

Dialogue: Just block the doors, any way you can.

Dialogue: Goddamn snakes!!

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: This is stupid.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: What are you doing?!

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: We can't make it. Just get away, when you get the chance.

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: What?

Dialogue: He wants me, Bill! I'm going to get him to take me to him! See if you can follow me, and kill him!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: No, Starla!   No!

Speaker: bill
Dialogue: Nooo!

Dialogue: Grant... Please...

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: I'm sorry... I know I haven't behaved how you -- how you want. I know. Don't... hurt... me.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: We need... to... talk.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Not here, though, okay? Not all of you. I'm not used to -- I want to talk to your face, Grant. Your more real face. Your --

Dialogue: We've surrounded the town, you prick! Ain't no way outta here!

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant?   We should talk.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Hey, Grant.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: You did some real interesting decorating here.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Hey.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Look, the sun's starting to come up.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Sorry. I didn't -- I didn't know you wanted it dark.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: You like these memories, huh, Grant?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: You like being called Grant, don't you?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: I think you do. You really do. You like being Grant. Like when we danced. And when you... made love to me here on the bed. Remember that?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: I know you've been alone, Grant. Almost forever. From here to there to there to here, there's never been another one for you.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Grant. Grant, I could help you. Be with you the way you want. See, I want to live. I've never had much use for this world, not really. You and I, together, we --

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: You don't trust me, I know. That's why I brought you someone, Grant.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: It's Bill. He's in the house next door. Just look.

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: See? I brought him here for you! As an offering! To prove I love you more than him!

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Now, Bill!!   Kill the motherfucker!!

Dialogue: Hey.

Dialogue: Hey.

Dialogue: Starla, over here.

Dialogue: We can probably get some first aid and food at this gas station up here.

Dialogue: Yeah.   Good.

Dialogue: Shit. I- I forgot... I wanted to get aspirin.

Dialogue: I'll get it for you.      Ibuprofen or aspirin?

Speaker: starla
Dialogue: Aspirin.

Dialogue: We'll just head up here into Bishopville, get checked up in the hospital. Then maybe we'll head off to Hollywood after all, huh?

Dialogue: Okay.

Dialogue: Please, Starla. I'm gonna do my best not to hurt anybody --

Dialogue: You took Bill.
